caption.title: Equilibrium richness and diversity in different scenarios as influenced by seed mass distribution mean and standard deviation.
caption.p:
The effect of seed mass distribution parameters mean and standard deviation on regional richness (A, D), gamma diversity (B,E), and the geometric mean SM weighted by regional abundances (C,F) during stable climates in the three scenarios. Top panels show the variable dispersal scenario, bottom row shows the SMSN trade-off dispersal scenario. The uniform scenario corresponds to the bottom line where SM distribution SD = 0 in all panels. Interspecific competition Î±
ij = 0.5.
Click here for additional data file.
